name: Treasure Tactics
description:
Treasure Tactics

🍊 Find the pirate’s booty and avoid other ships in this mix between real-time and turn based naval strategy!

🍊 Every 10 seconds a new turn begins and your action points are refreshed.

🍊 Every 10 seconds crew gobbles up one your precious oranges. Find more oranges on your journey to keep the ship going!

How to sail the seas:

🍊 Trust the wind - it’s always fastest to sail perpendicular to the wind.

🍊 Use your cannons - but don’t forget to dodge the enemy fire!

🍊 Keep your eye on the compass - it just might point you the right way.

🍊 Ration your oranges carefully - have patience, enemies might surprise you!

Controls: MoveLeft ClickShootRight ClickTurn CameraMiddle ClickZoom CameraScroll WheelPause MenuESC
